name: Flockbound
description:
[Left/Right] / [A/D] : Steer your flock
[Space Bar] : Scare Eagles away

Guide this growing flock of birds back home and keep your kin safe by scaring eagles away. A relaxing game to sit back, think about birds and enjoy the music.

Made by Broocevelt & Miguel Medina for the GMTK Game Jam 2021: Joined Together.

  • Programming: Miguel Medina, Broocevelt
  • Art: Broocevelt
  • Music: Broocevelt
